aliases: Meitantei Conan: Zero no Tea Time
description: The story focuses on the life of the triple agent as he attempts to keep all his different roles in check.

name: Jiu Tian Xuan Di Jue
aliases: The Success Of Empyrean Xuan Emperor

name: Hisui
description:
A woman is pronounced to be ill but it is too much for her to accept. Her thoughts and worries continually change to makes a strange and mysterious world.

1st year work 2016 by Yume Ukai, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Kageyama Tamio no Double Fantasy
description: A 2-part TV special. The first part is a comedic bickering couple taking a sketchy plane for vacation. The second part is a horror a camera crew encounter while staying at the Hotel Southpacific after landing.

name: Kaoru no Taisetsu na Mono
description: Spin-off of Kichikujima with super deformed characters.

name: Hagoromo
description:
Puppet animation created based on the "robe-of-feathers tradition" which gets across to Mohonomatsubara.

Department of Animation Graduate School of Film and New Media, first year work Tokyo University of the Arts.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjou, Aruiwa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen Season 2
aliases: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Season 2
Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjou, Aruiwa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen Season 2
The Last Battlefield Between You and I, or Perhaps the Beginning of the World's Holy War 2nd Season,
description:
The second season of Kimi to Boku no Saigo no Senjou, Aruiwa Sekai ga Hajimaru Seisen.

Iska guards Sisbell, sparking Alice's jealousy. Amid a conspiracy, can they thwart personal disputes and war?

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

name: TRIBE NINE
description:
Haru Shirogane is a weak-minded person who is constantly bullied while Taiga has traveled from across the sea in hopes of becoming the strongest man in the world. One night, the two meet up with Shun Kamiya, the strongest XB (Extreme Baseball) player, and leader of the Minato Tribe. When they meet, each of the Tribes scattered throughout Neo-Tokyo are about to face a major threat.

On the orders of the King of Neo-Tokyo, "Houtenshin", the Chiyoda Try, led by the mysterious Ojiro Otori, has started to take control of all the tribes in the country. Their evil clutches are about to reach the Minato Tribe...

(Source: MyAnimeList)

name: Black★★Rock Shooter: DAWN FALL
description:
The year is 2062. Earth has been left in ruin after the failure of a labor automation project when the AI called Artemis waged war against humanity. A girl, Empress, awakens in a research lab. As one of the three surviving guardians, she must destroy the Orbital Elevator before Artemis can complete its construction. Failure will result in a machine army overrunning Earth. However, Artemis' Unmanned Forces and a cult may have motives of their own.

(Source: Disney+)

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo
aliases: Mobile Suit Gundam: THE WITCH FROM MERCURY
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo
description:
A.S. (Ad Stella) 122― An era when a multitude of corporations have entered space and built a huge economic system. A lone girl from the remote planet Mercury transfers to the Asticassia School of Technology, run by the Beneritt Group which dominates the mobile suit industry. Her name is Suletta Mercury. With a scarlet light burning in her pure heart, this girl walks step by step through a new world.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Cucuruz Doan no Shima
aliases: Mobile Suit Gundam: Cucuruz Doan's Island
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Cucuruz Doan no Shima
description:
Announced at the "Dai 2-kai Gundam Conference" event, the film is described as a retelling of the 15th episode of the original Mobile Suit Gundam television anime. The episode itself has been omitted from English releases of the series.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: will+Dress Season 2
description: The fourth season of Cardfight!! Vanguard: overDress.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: will+Dress
description: The third season of Cardfight!! Vanguard: overDress.

name: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta… Movie
aliases: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Movie
Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta… Movie
description: After Catalina avoids her own death flag, she and her friends run into a mysterious young man traveling with a caravan. Who is this young man and what does he want?

name: Higashi Asia Bunka Toshi 2019 Toshima
aliases: Culture City of East Asia 2019 Toshima
description:
Higashi Asia Buka Toshi is a yearly event in agreement with Japan, China, and Korea's cultural ministries. A city or ward from each country is chosen to bring awareness to that city through its arts and culture. For 2019, Japan selected its Toshima ward of Tokyo city. This means that Toshima is now accepting any projects, logos, public relations, school projects, etc. among the Toshima citizens and businesses to create a Toshima-portfolio and tourism for the ward.

To mark the debut of Toshima's selection, a rotocoped short was released following a little girl's view of Toshima's attractions.

name: Fusuma 2
description: Short film by Yoriko Mizushiri.

name: Bloom
description: An elf of dandelion takes off her bloom after her boyfriend, who has transformed into down a bit earlier. But there are monsters outside, and they take aim at her. In the outer world with no one to depend on, she grows up bravely. (Source: Youtube)

name: Samayo Shinzo
description:
Two boys are playing in ruins. There is something lurking in the dark...This is the stop motion animation on the theme of fear.

Graduate Work 2011, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Prize: 2012 Puchon International Fantastic Film Festival in 2012, Jury's Choice 2012 24th Tokyo Students Film Festival, Grand prize＆Audience Award 2012　Independent Animation Festival, Jury's Choice 2012　Yubari International Fantastic Film Festival in 2012, scholarship 2011　Shimokitazawa Film Festival, Grand prize 2011　West Tokyo Film Festival, Excellence Award

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Inai inai baa ba
description:
The old granny playing peek-a-boo is gone. Instead, a stranger appears and draws closer to the child. Peek-a-boo involves exercising memory, and looking directly at your partner.

1st Year Work 2011 by Keiko Shiraishi, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Mai Sora
description:
Clouds flow by. Pictures evaporate. When the act of drawing is in tune with nature’s ways, an ancient poetry echoes through the sky and in due time brings rain.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Deep Awakening
description:
“He” has kept moving forward through his life. Nothing else bothered him. But, one day by chance he realized that he has definitely grown old. And eventually he makes a full stop.

1st year Work 2012 by Shizuka Miyazaki, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Decorations
description:
A quaint kitchen in a house tucked away in the outskirts of the city. Amidst preparations for a banquet, the birth of a new life brings turmoil and change. And then, she heads off on her own journey. Those who send her off recall the day they embarked on their own journeys, just like her.

Graduate Work 2014, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

2014 TOHO Cinemas Student Film Festival, Grand Prix of Short Animation 2014 32th Blue Wing Awards 2014 31th Chicago International Children’s Film Festival, Children's Jury Prize—Animated Short Film 2014 Toyama Waterfront Film Festival Sphere, Excellence Award 2014 18th Japan Media Arts Festival, Jury Selections 2015 10th Annual Children’s Film Festival Seattle, Best of Children’s Film Festival Seattle 2015 2015 Miyagi Sendai Animation Grand Prix 2015, Outstanding performance award 2015 TIFF Kids International Film Festival 2015, Adult Jury Award for Best Animated Short Film

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: UMISEA
description: Shorts featuring hololive's Ocean themed talents.

name: AOTU Shijie 3
description: Third season of AOTU Shijie.

name: Koupo Nichichi Kusa no Kurashi
description:
The story of Bear, Acorn, Prawn Fritter, and Reading Glasses, or Specs who live in a flat called Daisy Lodge from summer to a winter morning. And it continues to someday when we look back today.

1st year work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Tomato confit
description:
There once lived two brothers in a town. The elder lived alone. The younger lived with his parents. They did not get along well, did neither badly. They called each other occasionally. The elder one was impatient and emotional and does nothing but work. The younger one goes steadily his way. One day the elder brother’s face turned into a tomato...

Graduate Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Fusuma no Oku
description:
The theme came from the Japanese unique folklore, Red Uncleanness or defilement with blood. A girl, whose thinking pattern jumps at a leap without any train of thought, confines her various thoughts in the other side of the mirror and inside the sliding doors to go outside.

1st year Work 2012 by Yumi Kawai, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Hi Nante Nakunatte Shimae
description:
The protagonist hates the Japanese hiragana letter “hee.” Just the sight of it bothers her. But one day, she finds herself in a parallel world where the same syllabary lives a spectacular life.

Graduate Work 2019, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Brick Games
description:
There lives a little girl with her brother in a city full of skyscrapers. One night when they were playing with their favourite game Jenga, something strange happened.

1st year work 2016 by Lam Man Yee, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Srouce: Geidai Animation)

name: Omokage Tayuta
description:
This is the first letter addressed to you. A voyage to trace the vague images of memories.

Graduate Work 2016 by Hitomi Ohtakara, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation

name: Shikakui Sharin no Saihatsumei
description:
On various forms expanded in all the direction and a dance by a man in tights.

1st year work 2014 by Yasuaki Adachi, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Majutsushi to Yuki no Hana
description:
There is a family living in an air base town. I got a younger brother. Dad was only absent for work at the base and Mom was busy with the brother and little time for me. Out of loneliness and jealousy I hid brother’s charm. From that day, Dad stopped coming home...

Graduate Work 2011, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Nishikata Eiga)

name: Sokonashi Winna
description:
How to spend a ten-minute break at club activities. Let us take off the shoes and socks, and enjoy the fresh breeze between our toes. We are all flesh after all.

Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Charon Meiosei no kodoku
description:
In the pitch darkness a man cannot see anything. [The] only light source is a light lit with a match by someone else. The night is lit and put out. This repeats [for some time] and eventually the man makes up his mind.

1st year work 2016 Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Kumicho Musume to Sewagakari
aliases: The Mob Boss’s Daughter and Her Caretaker
description:
Kirishima Tooru is the right-hand man of the Sakuragi crime family. For him, the job is a perfect excuse to let his violent instincts run wild, earning him the nickname “the Demon of Sakuragi”. It seems like nothing will stand in the way of his vicious nature. But then one day, he receives an assignment like never before from the boss—babysitting his daughter! This is the heartwarming (or is it bloodcurdling?) story of a little girl and her yakuza caretaker!

(Source: Kaiten Books)

name: Ditou Rensheng
description:
Staring at the Smartphone all the time, people are gradually alienating themselves from normal life and others nearby. This film, Life Smartphone, with its satirical and humorous style, serves to depict the current social situation and give people a chance to be introspective.

(Source: SND Films)

name: Miato
description:
Graduate Work 2016, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Memories from the ancient times have been engraved on his body. "Where do we come from?"he asks,"Where are we going?" Would the light guide us there? This is a journey of blind pursuit for wisdom.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Yoru gohan no jikoku
description:
Playtime ends at the five o'clock chime. And there comes the indefinable time between vanishing playtime and dinner time at home. Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation by Saki Muramoto.

Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Taberu Hito-tachi
description:
People can show some other personality when eating. Some become like herbivores, chewing so many times. Some become like carps, crowding around bates. Some become like hamsters, with their mouths full, etc.. Everyone is unique and worth observation.

1st year Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: TOBACCO
description:
Tobacco has been fascinated people for centuries and does not allow them to stop smoking even they want to. Even though you want to finish with smoking, the spirits of tobacco are just behind you. Let’s enjoy a trip to the world of tobacco.

1st year Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Natsu no Joshin no Kuchi no Naka
aliases: Natsu no Joshin no Kuchi no Naka
description:
The beach is packed in a Chinese resort. People are enjoying the summer holidays. An abrupt thundershower makes them run around in a flurry.

Graduate Work 2016, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Shukatsu Kyosokyoku
description:
An ordinary college girl is sucked into the frenetic job hunting, where all her friends dive into with dog-eat-dog vigor and crazed ambition. A potent look at one of Japanese social phenomenon with a dose of black humor.

Graduate Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Al Dente Tango
description:
The stage is a fancy restaurant featuring live tango performances. Both the cuisine and the clientele are impeccable, and everyone is fully content. But one customer’s visit disrupts the tranquility.

1st year work 2011, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Under Ninja
description: Even in this day and age, Ninjas walk among us, hide within plain sight, still waiting for their mission orders. However, for some, it takes much longer to receive orders than others! Meet Kumogakure Kurō, a NEET and a Ninja. After being a long time without work, he finally receives orders from the higher-ups!

name: Biohazard Village × Ningyou Geki♪
description:
Play in Bio Village♪, is a series of short films produced by Capcom as part of their marketing campaign for Resident Evil Village, called "BIOHAZARD Village x Puppet Show". It takes the form of a children's TV show featuring puppet versions of the game's rogue's gallery. All the parts are played by the game's actual Japanese voice cast. To continue the theme of a children's show, the dialogue is in a slow manner as though intended for children, with the subtitles being almost exclusively in kana for ease of reading. In Capcom's announcement of the show, it joked it was being made in response to concerns the game was too scary.

(Source: Resident Evil Wiki)

name: Anon Sentai Ranger 5
description: Anon Pictures' parody of Super Sentai opening sequences.

name: Spots Spots
description:
A young man is drawing sketches of birds in the woods. The spotted pattern of the bird's wings begins to scatter. He gradually becomes mesmerized by the pattern …

1st Year Work 2011 by Yuanyuan Hu, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: in the sea and near a girl.
aliases: In the sea and near a girl.
description: Short animation by Masanobu Hiraoka with music and sound design by Aimar Molero.

name: Douluo Dalu: Chongfan Haotian
aliases: 斗罗大陆 第十部分
description: The tenth part of Douluo Dalu.

name: Heroine Tarumono!: Kiraware Heroine to Naisho no Oshigoto
aliases: Heroine Tarumono!: Kiraware Heroine to Naisho no Oshigoto
To Become a Real Heroine! The Unpopular Girl and the Secret Task
description:
Hiyori left her hometown to pursue her passion, track and field, by enrolling in Tokyo's Sakuragaoka High School. Looking for a part-time job in Tokyo, she ended up working as an apprentice manager for her classmates (and LIP×LIP members) Yuujirou Someya and Aizou Shibasaki. The story revolves around the coming-of-age of Hiyori (as she juggles school, extracurricular life, and managing) and LIP×LIP (as they shine on stage).

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Gunjou no Fanfare
description:
The story takes place at a horse racing academy that trains boys to become jockeys. The three-year academy is very competitive, and those who wish to enter must not only pass an academic test but a physical and fitness test as well. Yuu Arimura is a former popular idol who becomes enamored with horse racing after seeing it for the first time, and wants to join the academy. Shun Kanami was raised on an island, and only experienced horse races through radio broadcasts growing up. Amane comes from a high-class family in England, and his father is a former jockey. Amane has previously attended horse racing academies in various countries. The show follows these three 15-year-old boys at the academy.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Sasurai Zou-san
description: Short film by Yoriko Mizushiri.

name: Forever Kiss
description:
Andrew Chen's 3rd animated short film, Forever kiss. Originally published in 2006 as a class project. The subject for this project is "One Minute Eternity." Each animator was tasked to produced what they think is a one-minute eternity. The topic for this video is love between men and women. It is the experience of the moment when a couple kisses; the things around you; the oath of time; although "short'', it seems to be "eternal''!

(Source: Official Description)

name: Real Koke-kun
description:
KOKE-kun is a merchandise franchise of eight cartoon characters that each represent a real species of moss. To promote the brand, the Real Koke-kun initiative was born, where flash mobs dressed as the main green moss character would appear around Japan. During this time, an animated version of Real Koke-kun was created by Takashi Taniguchi.

(Source: MAL)

name: Girls & Panzer: Saishuushou Part 3 Specials
aliases: Girls und Panzer das Finale OVA,
Fushou Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza: Unique na Suiriku Ryouyou Sensha-hen,
The Humble Akiyama Yukari's Tank Course: Unique Amphibious Tank
description:
OVA included in the Blu-ray/DVD release of the third "Girls und Panzer das Finale" film.

One day at Oarai Girls High School, the five members of the Anglerfish Team are looking for a student named Jane, who belongs to the Agriculture Department, to deliver some documents of the Student Council. After unfamiliar horse riding, they finally arrive at the Agriculture Department building, where they meet Jane, who seems to be ready for battle with a gun in her hand. According to her, she is in the middle of chasing the "Arch Villain of the Century"...!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Blue Thermal
aliases: Blue Thermal: Aonagi Daigaku Taiikukai Koukuu-bu
description:
The story centers on Tamaki Tsuru, who was on sports teams throughout her entire school life until high school, but is instead seeking an active romantic life once she enters college. However, a turn of events puts her on the path to joining her university's glider club at college.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san Movie
description:
Takagi and Nishikata are in their final year of middle school, and have both anxiety and hope for the future. During the summer of their final year, on the day before summer vacation starts, the two find a kitten that they name Hana. They decide to take care of the kitten themselves until they can find its mother.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san 3
description: The third season of Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san.

name: Shikato
description:
Shikato can only walk in a straight line, which means that whether colliding into objects or falling off of things, something funny is always happening.

(Source: UrumaDelvi Site)

The series aired within Fuji TV's Ugo Ugo Ruga variety program.

name: Void
description:
A closed society, and idols created as numerical expressions of their own existence. Endless replications of the original data results in the loss of individuality, but emotional impulses begin to emerge.

1st year work 2017, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Kimi to Fit Boxing
description:
Kimi to Fit BoxingKimi to Fit Boxing is a short Japanese anime television series adaptation of the Nintendo Switch game named Fitness Boxing.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Kara no Tamago
description:
The film is about a family, [that] runs a chicken farm. The boy hankers after birds and his little sister keeps an eye on him. The father loves eggs. The mother loves somebody else. In the family fixture, each member stays there with bias or secrets.

Graduate Work 2012, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Hitotsu no kakera
description:
Dwarfs in red, blue and green colors have been working in each dark cabinet of a factory called television. They have kept working without questioning their own identities. Midori, a green dwarf, becomes aware of himself and starts his own creation…

1st-year work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon S: Mini Dra EX
aliases: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid S: Mini Dra EX
Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon S: Mini Dra EX
description: Extra episodes of Mini Dra shorts released across all five volumes of the Blu-ray/DVD releases of Kobayashi-san Chi no Maidragon S.

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maidragon S: Nippon no Omotenashi - Attend wa Dragon Desu
aliases: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid S: Japanese Hospitality - Attendance is a Dragon
Kobayashi-san Chi no Maidragon S: Nippon no Omotenashi - Attend wa Dragon Desu
Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid S Special
description: An unaired episode included in a special Blu-ray/DVD volume.

name: Vivy: Fluorite Eye’s Song - Pilot Movie
aliases: Vivy: Fluorite Eye’s Song - Pilot Movie
description: Pilot of Vivy -Fluorite Eye’s Song- that was produced before the main story was made. After the TV anime had fully aired, it was first unveiled on August 21, 2021 in WIT STUDIO's 10th Anniversary Online Talk Show #3 with featured guest and Vivy character designer loundraw. The pilot was later separately published on WIT Studio's official YouTube channel on August 24, 2021.

name: Ikashita shikaku
description: Surreal Short Movie by Katayama Takuto

name: Anata ga Miemashita
description:
Tosuke is a home tutor who meets a girl named Miyako on the job. She is blind and doesn't move or speak. But is Tosuke seeing the real Miyako?

1st year work 2017, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: CUE!
description:
Based on an idol-training mobile game produced by Liber Entertainment and Pony Canyon.

The brand-new voice actor office "AiRBLUE" has no track record or experience. Aspiring voice actors with rich individuality are signed on to the office. They do their best to achieve their dreams, but it's a tough world out there. No matter how much they practice, not everyone will pass the audition.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Sabiiro no Armor
description:
The anime adaptation of Rusted Armors, a multimedia project that first started with a stage play and a manga adaptation. The project focuses on the relationship between the gun-toting Magoichi — who is the leader of the Saika Ikki mercenary group — and the Sengoku era warlord Oda Nobunaga.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Ganbare, Douki-chan
description: Announced on Yom's Twitter, a web anime adaptation of Ganbare, Douki-chan. The story follows an office lady, Douki-chan, who is working with Douki-kun in an office. Unbeknownst to Douki-kun, Douki-chan secretly has feelings for him. As Douki-chan struggles to confess her feelings, her rivals, both the kohai and senpai, continue to vie for his affection.

name: Lotus
description: Vividly colored psychedelic animation.

name: Minegishi-san wa Ootsu-kun ni Tabesasetai
description: Mini anime series of Minegishi-san wa Ootsu-kun ni Tabesasetai.

name: Yojouhan Time Machine Blues
description:
It is August 12th. After the remote control to his boarding house's only air conditioning unit is inadvertently destroyed by spilled cola, "I" devises a plan to return to yesterday in a time machine to recover the remote before it breaks. However, his friend Ozu cannot resist playing with past events, even when it means bringing the universe to the brink of destruction. Now "I" finds himself racing through time to avoid disaster.

(Source: Disney+)

name: Blue Lock
description:
Japan’s desire for World Cup glory leads the Japanese Football Association to launch a new rigorous training program to find the national team’s next striker. Three hundred high school players are pitted against each other for the position, but only one will come out on top. Who among them will be the striker to usher in a new era of Japanese soccer?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: This is My Story
description: Short animation about hololive Vtuber, Yukihana Lamy's background and lore.

name: Hei Mao Jing Zhan Zhi Fei Cui Zhi Xing
description:
In this exciting Chinese action flick, Mr. Black is back! After notorious criminal rat, One-Ear escapes, Mr. Black organises a all-points bulletin to capture him. But more trouble is brewing: a mad ape scientist, Dr. Big Ape seeks revenge on those who have wronged him. Now joining forces with One-Ear, they have a diabolical plan up their sleeve: to kidnap the citizens and banish them to space using the "Emerald Star" on opening day. With the help of his fellow officers and a young pig partner, Mr. Black faces his foes in an epic showdown of the "Emerald Star"

(Source: IMDB)

name: Toaru Kagaku no Suzushina Yuriko
description: An April Fool's PV.

name: O'sumo-san
description: An animation by Sawako Kabuki

name: Yellow Fish
description: A chaotic psychedelic animation is collocated with images of the sea of ​​clouds seen from the mountaintop and the candles of a Tibetan temple.

name: Kidou
description: Similar to "SPIN", it is an abstract animation with delicate line drawings. There are single color and color versions. The songs used in the work are handled by Shigenobu Nakamura, as in the previous work.

name: Princess Principal: Crown Handler - Chapter 3
description: The third out of six movie sequels to the TV series.

name: Hanabi-chan wa Okure-gachi
aliases: Hanabichan ~The girl who popped out of the game world~
description:
Recent college graduate Musashi Shinonome is visiting the Shitamachi God Heaven pachinko hall after inheriting it from his late grandfather. Inside, he stumbles upon a girl sleeping in a futon, who wakes up upon his arrival. She introduces herself as Hanabi Hana Ariake: a self-proclaimed perfected pachislot machine that has turned into a human. To prove this, she demonstrates her ability to transform and shoot fireworks out of her body.

Over the following days, Musashi meets two of Ariake's human pachislot machine sisters—the energetic Versus Ikusa Takanawa and the loving Thunder Rai Nihonbashi. Now, Musashi and the dynamic trio must work together to make the grand reopening of Shitamachi God Heaven a success.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

name: Love All Play
description:
The story follows Ryou Mizushima, who was once an obscure badminton player in middle school. He now strives to become a top athlete and take his high school team to the inter-high tournament.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Non Non Biyori: Nonstop OVA
aliases: のんのんびより のんすとっぷ 第13話
Non Non Biyori Nonstop: Our Club Worked Hard
Non Non Biyori Nonstop: Bukatsu wo Ganbatta
description:
Beginning her academic journey as a first grader, Shiori comes face to face with the aspect of school she has heard alarming rumors about—homework! However, her worries quickly turn into excitement as the Asahigaoka girls agree to work together to complete their assignments at Komari and Natsumi Koshigaya's house. Their plan appears to be successful until an all-too-familiar feeling of procrastination creates a rowdy distraction for Natsumi.

On another day, Natsumi asks her teacher Kazuho Miyauchi if she can form and lead a new badminton school club. While the lack of funding and equipment proves to be a major setback, it does not stop Natsumi and the other girls from asking the candy store owner Kaede Kagayama for some help. During their spontaneous badminton practice, a minor accident leads Kaede to reminisce about a memorable day when she babysat Renge Miyauchi.

(Source: MAL)

name: Beyblade Burst Dynamite Battle
aliases: ベイブレードバースト ダイナマイトバトル
description:
The story centers on Bell Daikokuten, the leader of the Bey graveyard "Makai no Mon." Bell, who holds Dynamite Belial, declares war on Bladers across the world.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Quanzhi Fashi 5
description: The fifth season of Quanzhi Fashi

name: Eien no 831
description:
In the present day, the world is in turmoil due to an "unprecedented disaster". A young man living in Tokyo, Suzushiro, has a secret he cannot tell anyone. That secret is that he can stop the time around him despite his thoughts. One day, he meets a girl named Nazuna who has the same "power". When he learns that she is being used in a crime, he impulsively reaches out to help her.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Tentaifu
description: Using the constellation as a motif, the heavens and the earth, metamorphose all the creatures. An animated 16 mm short film.

name: Azicon Opening Animation
description: Opening animation for Azicon

name: Zetsubou no Kaibutsu
description:
A story about fourteen-year-old alien girl Aoi Hoshino. Her family uses a certain medicine to disguise themselves as humans. For some reason the medicine slowly stops working, but only on Aoi...

(Source: Official Website, edited)

name: Kaigo to Ikiru
description: Japanese issuance company SOMPO Himawari Life Insurance commissioned Tekken to produce a commercial to promote their "Insurhealth" services, which seek to combine the functions of insurance and healthcare services. It follows a daughter caring for her aging mother that is facing various mental and physical complications after her husband passes away.

name: Ore, Tsushima
description: Web anime of Ore, Tsushima streamed on Asmik Ace's official YouTube channel.

name: Tempura
description: Masashi and Takeshi are lost in the woods while looking for their loving dog John. They find John in a cave in the woods, but something is wrong with John...

name: Kurama no Himatsuri
aliases: The Fire Celebration at the Kurama
description: 1st year work 2017, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation. Yuki-jinja Shrine is located in Kurama, Kyoto. Every year, a unique fire festival is held at the shrine. This film mixes documentary and fantasy to depict the people, deities, and spirits who create the festival together. (Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Benghuai 3: Xin Yan Yong Ran
description:
When the darkness seized the long night
Did it envisage its end at the hands of a shooting star?

She is Kiana Kaslana, K423, Sirin, Herrscher of the Void, and Herrscher of Flamescion.

She broke away from her former self and past confusion.
She will go toward a brighter tomorrow with an unwavering heart.
She grasps her greatsword tight to protect all that is beautiful and give this sad story a happy ending.

(Source: Youtube Description)

name: Meiji-hen
description: A CM themed around the light novel Nijuuseiki Denki Mokuroku.

name: Madoromi no Shuumatsu
description:
Provided the world ends tomorrow, what would we want in the last day of grace? A beam of light embraces a woman and a man then, the world gently closes its eyes.

Graduate Work 2016, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Shiroi Suna no Aquatope Mini
aliases: #白い砂のアクアトープ みに
The two girls met in the ruins of damaged dream
description: Mini animations featuring the characters from The aquatope on white sand anime posted on the official Aquatope Twitter account.

name: Kaigara no ura
description:
The film is a journal of a woman who travels in time, in peoples and in mind.

1st year work 2016, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Mou Ippon!
description:
After one last tournament and an embarrassing loss in the final round, Michi decides to call it quits on the sport of judo. Between high school social activities and entrance exams, she’ll have no time to compete in the martial art she loves most, but putting aside old hobbies is a normal part of growing up. Still, the love of judo lingers—and it comes back full force when she meets her new classmate Towa, the girl who bested Michi in her final match! Towa wants to form a judo club at their school, but she’ll need new members to get it up and running. United by their love of judo, they’ll throw in their passions into the ring together and score ippon again!

(Source: HIDIVE)

name: Kaijin Kaihatsubu no Kuroitsu-san
aliases: Kuroitsu-san in the Superhuman Research & Development Department
Kuroitsu-san from the Monster Development Department
description:
The story centers on the Kuroitsu, an assistant researcher in the superhuman research & development department of Agastya, a villainous secret organization that battles with heroes who try to save the world. Kuroitsu lives a busy life in Agastya, caught between the absurd requests of her bosses; making presentations; implementing new features into superhumans; and getting results within the allotted time, budget, and spec requests; all without vacation.
(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Vinland Saga Season 2
description:
A new millennium begins in the southern part of the Jutland peninsula in Denmark.
After the death of his longtime enemy, Askeladd, Thorfinn lost his purpose in life. He was bought by the landowner Ketil as a "slave" and engaged in land reclamation work on his farm. Thorfinn meets a young man there, Einar, who was also a slave like him. The encounter with Einar led Thorfinn to face the sins he had committed and began to find meaning in life.
On the other hand, Canute, who became the King of England, attempted to extend his territory for the establishment of "the promised land".

(Source: Official Website)

name: Moeru Butsuzou Ningen
description:
There is a series of Buddha statue thefts in Kyoto. Beniko, a high school girl, gets the Buddha statue at her family's temple stolen and has her parents killed at the same time. Beniko hears from Enju, her parents' friend, that a robbery group called SEADDATTHA is the one who killed her parents, and feels the strong urge for vengeance. Enju offers Beniko to live with him since she has no place to go. She wanders into Enju's secret room and meets an ugly creature that looks like a fusion of her parents and Buddha statue...

(Source: IMDb)

name: Isekai Cheat Magician: Yoiboshi no Matsuri to Majutsushi
aliases: Isekai Cheat Magician: Magicians and the Starry Night Festival
Isekai Cheat Magician: Yoiboshi no Matsuri to Majutsushi
description: The thirteenth episode that aired with the rebroadcast of Isekai Cheat Magician.

name: Violence Voyager
description: On their way to another village, two children are looking for a shortcut through the mountain, but instead stumble into an amusement park called Violence Voyager, and everything goes wrong.

name: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo: "Rail Zeppelin" Grace note Special
aliases: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo: "Rail Zeppelin" Grace note Special
description:
The Aniplex Online Fest 2021 event announced on Sunday that production on a special edition for the Lord El-Melloi II's Case Files: Rail Zeppelin Grace note television anime has been green-lit

- ANN

name: Gift±
description:
With the growing demand for high-quality organ transplants in Japan, many underground organizations have carried out kidnapping and murder operations to obtain organs for sale; surgeon doctors also started practicing. It even began to intervene in outside countries like China.

Our protagonist, Tamaki Suzuhara, a beautiful but mysterious high school girl, tries to find someone very important to her who is currently missing. She joined an illegal organ trafficking network, which kidnapped those who were judged "morally cure" for morphological, surgical removal of organs.

Let's see where this bloody journey and Tamaki Suzuhara's moral dilemma will lead. Can she find what she wants?

name: Holiday Love: Fuufukan Renai
description:
Can a relationship survive after an affair? Azu is 30-year-old stay at home mom and she runs a nail salon in her apartment. While carrying the frustration of thinking that her husband Junpei (32) doesn't love her as a woman anymore, she raises the child they were blessed with and continues through the motions of everyday life. One day, while Azu is running her salon, a customer asks to borrow her cellphone, and shows her something dangerously entrancing. A few days afterward, she receives a notification from an unknown man, sending Junpei and Azu's relationship into the deep-end... From Yukari Koyama of the TV drama "Rose-Colored Crusade" comes a challenging original work! You are invited to the story of 4 married people that could take place anywhere, filled with temptation, betrayal, and broken hearts - a true love story!

(Source: Manga Box)

name: Musunde Hiraite
description:
Named after a Japanese children's song meaning "Closed Hands, Open Hands", Musunde Hiraite is an ensemble story that primarily follows Hiroshi Furuya, a high school student who falls head over heals for Himari Asaki, a beautiful high school senior, on the day of his high school entrance. Although Hiroshi constantly tries to confess his feelings, Himari studiously avoids him, because she's secretly afraid of men.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Strike the Blood FINAL
description: The fifth season of Strike the Blood.

name: Fruits Basket: prelude
aliases: The Story of Kyoko and Katsuya
description:
A compilation film that will include the previously announced Kyоuko to Katsuya no Monogatari anime that will center on the backstory of Tooru's parents Kyоuko and Katsuya, which the 2019-2021 series did not adapt. The film will also include new scenes — written specifically for the film by Takaya — depicting events from after the television anime's story.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song - To Make Everyone Happy With My Singing
aliases: Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song - To Make Everyone Happy With My Singing
Vivy: Fluorite Eye’s Song - Tokubetsu Sōshūhen - To Make Everyone Happy with My Singing
description: Recap of all 13 episodes of Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song.

name: Ficfyon7
description:
The noise of the badly projected cathode ray tube image cleared up and a news program called "Ficfyon 7" appeared on the monitor. Professor Kim Wilson, an expert on the mysterious genre of "Ficfyon" was introduced as a guest, and the host asked him questions about the current state of "Ficfyon." The professor's answer was not in words, but a mysterious gesture. With the presenter's astonished expression, the images on the monitor split and repeat like a matryoshka. Eventually, the program ends as if nothing had happened, but the strange loop continues afterwards...

(Source: CaRTe bLaNChe)

name: Fumetsu no Anata e: Fushi no Tabiji
aliases: Fumetsu no Anata e: Fushi no Tabiji
description: Recap of episodes 1 to 12 of Fumetsu no Anata e.

name: Alice to Therese no Maboroshi Koujou
aliases: Alice to Therese no Maboroshi Koujou
description:
A factory explosion plunges a small town into a timeless freeze, leaving 14-year-old Masamune and his pals to grapple with a quickly collapsing reality.

(Source: Netflix)

name: Seiken Densetsu: Legend of Mana - The Teardrop Crystal
aliases: Legend of Mana: The Teardrop Crystal
Seiken Densetsu: Legend of Mana - The Teardrop Crystal
description:
Not far from the town of Domina lives Shiloh, a boy who keeps hearing a voice in his dreams about a mission he must fulfill. But what mission could he be needed for remains unknown. That all changes when he meets two Jumi, a race that’s hunted for their unique gemstones, as a sudden outbreak of attacks against the Jumi occurs. His dream, his quest, becomes clear—help the Jumi and their gemstones!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: NOMAD: Megalo Box 2 - Hachidori to tabibito.
aliases: NOMAD: Megalo Box 2 - Hachidori to tabibito.
description: A short anime included in the NOMAD: Megalo Box 2 Blu-ray Disc box set, based on the "Las alas del viajero" story that was featured in the anime

name: Tie Jie Gang Bing 2
description: The second season of Tie Jie Gang Bing

name: Tie Jie Gang Bing
description:
College graduate Mu Siyun submitted his resume and suddenly became the head of a space fleet, leading thousands of mecha girl soldiers to conquer the universe!

(Source: WeComics)

name: Renou Xueyuan
description:
In a certain world bubble, the conflict between the armed dolls and the dead soldiers is never ending. With the conflict between the two escalating, the stability of the world bubble is gradually decreasing. To save the world from collapse, human beings set up a special organization to manage and control the dolls. In order to cover up the dark truth, human specially gave the organization a very cute name: "Renou Xueyuan" - "Doll School".

—Ahaha, just kidding! How could it possibly be anything like that?

(Source: Benghuai 3 Weibo, translated)

name: Waccha PriMagi!
description:
Matsuri Hibino spends her days in middle school dreaming about PriMagi, the sparkling stage show that combines song, dance and fashion with actual magic. She’d love to star in the PriMagi one day, and when the spirited troublemaker Myamu appears from another, magical world to scout Matsuri as her PriMagi partner, the pair takes to the stage to become the top stars of PriMagi hand in hand!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

name: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story Final Season
aliases: Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story Final Season
Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica Gaiden Final Season - Asaki Yume no Akatsuki
Magia Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story Final Season - Dawn of a Shallow Dream
description: The third and final season of Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica Gaiden.

name: Bakuten!! Movie
description: Follow-up anime film for Bakuten!!

name: K×Drop!!
description: Endou, a night guard, was patrolling the mall as usual. But this night was going to be different from usual...

name: Hula Fulla Dance
description:
The story centers on Hiwa Natsunagi, a novice at hula dancing who nevertheless takes a job as a hula dancer at the real life Spa Resort Hawaiians hotel. The film shows the relationships between her and her colleagues.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Kusa no issho
description:
A town flourishes on the sea, and a weed take shelter there. From then on, the weed endlessly repeats its small and harsh life. The weed uses its own body to perform a dance that condenses the things perceived in that town over a lifetime.

1st Year Work 2011, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Flowers
description:
A girl who loves to dance but has no talent. "Talent" is not something to be added on, but rather "complements what is lacking." The important thing is to continually keep the easily wilted "flower" blooming beautifully.

1st Year Work 2011 by Toyomi Morishita, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

name: High Card
description:
After discovering that his orphanage was on the brink of closing due to financial stress, Finn, who was living freely on the streets, set out for a casino with the aim of making a fortune. However, nothing could have prepared Finn for the nightmare that was awaiting him. Once there, Finn encountered a car chase and bloody shootout caused by a man's “lucky” card.
Finn will eventually learn what the shootout was about. The world order can be controlled by a set of 52 X-Playing cards with the power to bestow different superhuman powers and abilities to the ones that possess them. With these cards, people can access the hidden power of the “buddy” that can be found within themselves.

There is a secret group of players called High Card, who have been directly ordered by the king of Fourland to collect the cards that have been scattered throughout the kingdom, while moonlighting as employees of the luxury car maker Pinochle. Scouted to become the group's fifth member, Finn soon joins the players on a dangerous mission to find these cards.

However, Who's Who, the rival car maker obsessed with defeating Pinochle, and the Klondikes, the infamous Mafia family, stand in the way of the gang.

A frenzied battle amongst these card obsessed players, fueled by justice, desire, and revenge, is about to begin!

name: Mega Man: Fully Charged
description:
The series follows Aki Light, an advanced robot who looks like and lives the routine of a human schoolboy. He was built by scientist Dr. Light as his son and lives with his biologically human sister Suna Light. They live in Silicon City, a town co-inhabited by robots and humans rather peacefully, though is currently seeing new attacks from rogue robots.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Mignon
description: Mignon is an original BL anime from South Korea. The animation follows a complex and exciting story of drama and desires. It revolves around a boxer named Mignon, and a vampire doctor Young-on Oh, who find solace in the presence of one another through an aggressive and romantic affair.

name: Captain N: The Game Master
description:
The Ultimate Warp Zone sucks young Kevin Keene through his bedroom television screen into the animated world of Video Land. Kevin turns a disorganized bunch of Videoland heroes into an organized team and together they save Princess Lana from the clutches of the villainous Mother Brain.

(Source: Captain N DVD summary)

name: Girls & Panzer Movie: Cinematic Concert - Fushou Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza - Shoujun-hen
aliases: Girls & Panzer Movie: Cinematic Concert - Fushou Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza - Shoujun-hen
Girls und Panzer der Film Cinematic Concert: Unlucky Yukari Akiyama's Tank Course
description: An additional episode of Fushou Akiyama Yukari no Sensha Kouza released with the BD of the cinematic concert for the movie.

name: Rock'n Roll Sentou
description: An early short film by Ryoji Yamada.

name: Space Battleship Yamato 2205: A New Journey
aliases: Space Battleship Yamato 2205: A New Journey
Uchuu Senkan Yamato 2205: Aratanaru Tabidachi - Zenshou -TAKE OFF-
description: The first film in a duology of Uchuu Senkan Yamato 2205: Aratanaru Tabidachi.

name: "Uchuu Senkan Yamato" to Iu Jidai: Seireki 2202-nen no Sentaku
aliases: "Uchuu Senkan Yamato" to Iu Jidai: Seireki 2202-nen no Sentaku
description: Compilation of Uchuu Senkan Yamato 2202: Ai no Senshi-tachi.

name: Bright: Samurai Soul
description:
Izo, a Ronin, and Raiden, an orc, work to bring a young elf girl and the wand she carries to the land of the elves in the north.

(Source: Netflix)

name: Make My Day
description:
On a cold planet of ice and snow, mysterious creatures suddenly have appeared from the dark underground and have begun to attack the inhabitants. Can humanity survive the terror lurking beyond the horizon?

(Source: Netflix)

name: exception
description:
In the distant future, human beings have been forced to leave earth and migrate to another galaxy. An advanced team of spacecraft arrives at a planet that is to be terraformed. Each member of the team is output by a biological 3D printer.

(Source: Netflix)

name: Shachiku-san wa Youjo Yuurei ni Iyasaretai.
aliases: Miss Shachiku and the Little Baby Ghost
Shachiku-san wa Youjo Yuurei ni Iyasaretai.
Ms. Corporate Slave Wants to be Healed by a Loli Spirit
description:
A little ghost girl gets worries when Ms. Fushihara, a corporate slave, is working till midnight, and tries to make her go home. While saying "Leave now~," the ghost girl helps and brings her refreshments, healing Ms. Fushihara's heart with her preciousness. Be healed by the heartwarming daily life of the cute little ghost and the corporate slave Ms. Fushihara.

(Source: MAL News)

name: Ana (Hole)
description:
There was a man with a hole in his belly. The reason was not certain but he just kept eating the food that grew on the tables as if to fill his hole. All of a sudden the food disappeared, something came up from the table and ran away. He was at a loss but killed it to fill the hole with the dead body. The hole was filled half by the dead body.

1st Year Work 2010, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Warriors
description:
Men's muscle, lust for battle, conflict, and the game.

Graduate Work 2014 by Noriko Okamoto, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Tales Of Crestoria Behind the Scenes
aliases: Tales Of Crestoria Behind the Scenes
Tales Of Crestoria Off Shot Movie
description: Kanata, Misella, and Vicious sit around a kotatsu in a Japanese-style room, when Cress, protagonist of Tales of Phantasia, the first game of the series, enters through a time-slip from 1995!

name: Tobidase! Narase! Pui Pui Molcar
description:
Compilation film of all 12 episodes of Pui Pui Molcar into an MX4D theatrical film.

(Source: ANN)

name: Gogo 2-ji Onshitsu nite
description:
A story of two boys is told through an dragonfly specimen. Is the story told from the boy's side? Or is this a dragonfly's dream? Who is the dragonfly? Is he alive or dead? One thing is clear - "his" hands are warm.

Graduate Work 2013, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Cubic Centimeter
description:
This animation shows how the liquid in a glass erupts, spreads, mix, and overflows.

1st year work 2013 by Tsumugi Harunari, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Magokoro? Masuta
description:
Kosaku Sarutahiko is a miniscule manager of a mysterious café. He tries many ways to treat his customer with the coffee he brewed but…

1st year work 2016 by Erica Ohyama, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Shoujo no Ito, Mahou no Ito
aliases: Shoujo no Ito, Mahou no Ito
description:
A girl is kept on the trot by a witch and continues to peel potatoes. She is fed up and tries to escape in vain. She gets desperate and decides to beat the witch... After all what will she find? What is her intention? Can we undo what has been done?

Graduate Work 2011, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: There was a man
description:
An one-armed mountaineer encounters a lost arm on a mountain of salt. Who did it belong to? Why was it left there?

Graduate Work 2017 by Moeka YAMAZAKI, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: The Gregory Gallery Tour
description:
Three unbroadcasted exclusive Special shorts of Gregory Horror Show (presented as bonus videos on the first series DVDs volumes 1-3 in Japan only), containing stories featuring Gregory himself as a guide, giving his commentary and thoughts on each of the guests in the hotel, also displaying paintings based around the said guests.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name: Wo Zhen de Meiyong Mie?
description:
Star is born to run over the heads of the fainting people. When he witnesses a "premeditated" fainting event, he decides to set up an agency. Together with his close friend Dazhi, they'll help the people who want to know the truth and explore the meaning of existence.

(Source: bilibili, translated)

name: Free!–the Final Stroke– Kouhen
aliases: Free! the Final Stroke: The Second Volume
description:
Sequel film to Free!: the Final Stroke - Zenpen.

After his first appearance on the competitive world stage, Haruka was overwhelmed by Albert’s swimming and lost his way. “What are you swimming for?” His reason to swim and what the water means to him are called into question. The question has trapped Haruka, and he struggles to find the answer on his own.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: He Wei Dao x Hui Yeda Xiaojie Xiangyao Wo Gaobai
aliases: He Wei Dao x Hui Yeda Xiaojie Xiangyao Wo Gaobai
Nissin x Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen
He Wei Dao x Kaguya-sama: Love Is War?

name: Tosca
description: Based on an old Russian folk song. This short film by Ryoji Yamada was created in blackboard animation.

name: Wan Jie Shen Zhu 3rd Season
description: The third season of Wanjie Shenzhu.

name: LaLaLa, BROTHERS
description: The way the everyday and the extraordinary constantly change in the environment around us and within ourselves.Graduate work by Ryoji Yamada at Tama Art University 2011.

name: Hairpin Double
description: An original short anime made in celebration of Okayama International Circuit's 30th anniversary.

name: Kyuuketsuki Sugu Shinu
aliases: The Vampire Dies in No Time
description:
Legendary vampire hunter Ronaldo finds an unlikely (and unwilling) ally in Draluc, the world’s weakest vampire who turns to dust at the slightest attack. Together they’re in for more hilarious misadventures than you can shake a stake at, including enemy vampires, axe-wielding editors, and other pains in the neck.

(Source: Funimation)

name: Gundam: G no Reconguista III - Uchuu kara no Isan
aliases: Gundam: G no Reconguista III - Uchuu kara no Isan
description: The third film compiling the Gundam: G no Reconguista TV series.

name: Joint
description: An event that happens to a man based on growth, psychology, egoism, and shamanism. Short animation by Ryoji Yamada at Tama Art University.

name: Ano chi
description:
This story is about a place long ago, before birth and before death, that everyone knows and no one knows.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Ningyo no Uta
description:
A boy and a girl draw pictures on the wall with sticks made of black fish. One day a blue fish drifts ashore to them.

1st year work 2017, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED FREEDOM
description:
A new Gundam SEED Movie announced as part of the project "Mobile Suit Gundam SEED PROJECT Ignited" in celebration of Gundam SEED's upcoming 20th anniversary in 2022.

It is now Cosmic Era (C.E.) 75, two years after the dismantlement of the Destiny Plan, but warfare still continues to rage on between Naturals and Coordinators. Independence movements are now sprouting up across Earth, and invasions by Blue Cosmos grow exponentially stronger... To deal with these predicaments, a World Peace Supervision Organization known as COMPASS has been established, with PLANT Chairwoman Lacus Clyne as the founding leader. Kira Yamato and the others, as its new members, intervene into various battles for the sake of this peace. However, as these battles take place, an emergent nation known as 'FOUNDATION' appears, and they propose a joint operation to attack the Blue Cosmos Headquarters. Will Destiny run its course, or will Kira still have the Freedom to resist against impossible odds?

name: Ling Long: Incarnation Special
description: Special chapter of Ling Long: Incarnation.

name: I Am A Great God Second Season
aliases: I Am A Great God Second Season
description: Second season of Wo Shi Da Shen Shan.

name: light of temptation
description:
The angel of wind exhales, sending fluffy dandelion seeds into a slow dance. Wind and light guide the downy seeds into the magical world of botany.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: AWOL Compression Re-MIX
description:
Cyress was a peaceful planet until Solomon, a mysterious terrorist group lead by Duran Gash, seizes seven PDP missiles that are capable of destroying entire planets. Jim Hyatt is chosen to be the man to lead a team to do what seems to be impossible: Find a way to both rescue the hostages and reclaim or destroy the deadly PDP missiles. The problem though is that the team members don't really like each other...

(Source: ThemovieDB)

Roughly one-third of the original footage was removed in this abridged and re-edited home video version of the 1998 TV series.

In an attempt to tighten the pacing, the sub-plot of Marrius and the entirety of episode 3 were removed, as well as many other scenes in the following episodes, while other footage was placed in different order.

(Source: MAL)

name: Sangenshoku
description: A collaboration between cell phone service provider ahamo x music duo YOASOBI: A special movie (music video) directed by Sou Matsumoto for the song Sangenshoku by YOASOBI. The song and music video are based on the novel "RGB" by Yuuichirou Komikado.

name: Blue: Line Step Brush
description: Promotional video for Amgakuin (AMG), a school for artists who want to become active in the entertainment industry. This PV is directed by Kengo Saitou and produced for the institute's 25th anniversary. All key figures to this animation are alumni from AMG and are now successfully working in the anime industry. The theme song is "Ikuru" by the band UNDER GRAPH.

name: Panda no Shizuka
description:
Siblings Karl, Addy, and Michael have a very special next-door neighbor: a wise panda named Stillwater. His friendship and stories give them new perspectives on the world, themselves, and each other.

(Source: Apple TV)

name: Wasure tamari
description:
Shiroinu writes down the day's events before he goes to sleep. One day, he opens a drawer buried in the snow and finds old diary entries. He realizes that he's forgotten the sensations and emotions from that time to the extent that he feels like he's reading about someone else's life.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Take Me Home
description:
"Brothers eating dinner, a girl watering the plants, a boy awakening in the night… The daily scenery from the house where they all lived at one point or another.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Akabashi wa Ochita
aliases: The Red Bridge is falling down
description:
Everyone crosses the Red Bridge and yet no one likes him. One day, he falls into the deep valley.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Taisei Kensetsu CM: Myanmar
description: Commercial directed by Makoto Shinkai for the Taisei Corporation

name: Cyborg 009: The Cyborg Soldier - Kami no Ubugoe
aliases: Cyborg 009: The Cyborg Soldier - Kami no Ubugoe
description: The unaired final episode of Cyborg 009: The Cyborg Soldier. It was released on DVD two years after the show finished its televised broadcast.

name: Cyborg 009: The Cyborg Soldier - Yomi no Gunzou
aliases: Cyborg 009: The Cyborg Soldier - Yomi no Gunzou
description: A recap episode of Cyborg 009: The Cyborg Soldier that aired between episode 47 and 48.

name: Yelp
description:
Once we used to be happy and grateful for the pure act of eating

Graduate Work 2017 by Umemura Haruka, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: That's why they were made
description:
A robot works at a factory repeating the same operation everyday. One day an unexpected visitor arrives and changes his routine.

1st year work 2017, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: geidai Animation)

name: Komi-san wa, Komyushou desu.
description:
At a high school full of unique characters, Tadano helps his shy and unsociable classmate Komi reach her goal of making friends with 100 people.

(Source: Netflix)

name: Kaijuu shinwa
description:
In the moments before death, one of the Battling Gods recalls his defeat in a magnificent fight. That battle transcended meta worlds, time and parallel universes as the Battling God faced off with another of his kind. All living creatures celebrated their fight with cries of joy.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Cosmopolite
description:
Graduate Work 2017 from Rina Okada, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

Hold up minerals and natural stones to the sunlight. Search for the shapes where light shines through and the shapes of shadows. The process of a small spot gradually finding its own form.

name: Rasen no Qualia
description:
"Inorganic and disconnected substances are infected with consciousness. They wander between points and surfaces believing they are complete individuals.

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
description:
The Red Ribbon Army was once destroyed by Son Goku. Individuals, who carry on its spirit, have created the ultimate Androids, Gamma 1 and Gamma 2. These two Androids call themselves “Super Heroes”. They start attacking Piccolo and Gohan… What is the New Red Ribbon Army's objective? In the face of approaching danger, it is time to awaken, Super Hero!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Typhoon No.14
description:
Okinawa is ominous right before the arrival of a typhoon. At first, Anri is excited by the unusual turn of events, but gradually she becomes fearful of the threatening typhoon. Then, her big sister tells her that typhoons have an eye...

Graduate Work 2018, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

name: Ndaho Kekkon Omedetou!!
description: An animation celebrating Fischer's member Ndaho's marriage.

name: Mahoutsukai Reimeiki
description:
The war that raged between the Church and the Witches for five centuries finally ended in peace but a few short years ago. However, nestled in the shadowy places of the world, the embers of that age old conflict still smoulder.

Attending the Royal Academy of Magic of the Kingdom of Wenias is a struggling student named Sable, who has no memories of his time before being enrolled. At the command of Headmaster Albus, he left the Kingdom to travel to the southern reaches of the continent, where anti-magic insurgents are still a force to be reckoned with, as part of a special training regimen. Accompanying him are a party of individuals strong in both ability and personality; there's the one known as the Witch of the Dawn, Roux Cristasse, who seeks the forbidden knowledge of primeval magic in the 'Grimoire of Zero', the genius girl Holtz, as well as the school's sole beast, Kudd.

Just what truth shall they uncover in their journey to the south...?

name: Lux Straight & Beauty Massugu Ikiru
description: A commercial for Lux shampoo and conditioner featuring virtual idol Hatsune Miku and Ghost in the Shell star Scarlett Johansson.

name: Love is an Elevator
description:
The story about two elevators which their love does not grow because of swayed by people around them.
Independent animation by Tomoki Misato.

name: Initial D Battle Stage 3
description:
Initial D: Battle Stage 3 is the eleventh and final installment of the Initial D series. It features every race from Fifth Stage and Final Stage. Unlike the previous two battle stages, it does not feature any new battles, and doesn't feature any character dialogue.

(Source: Initial D Wiki)

name: Shiguang Daili Ren
description:
In a modern metropolis there is a small store called "Time Photo Studio." Although only a few customers come to visit, it's actually run by Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, two men with special powers. They cooperate and use their super powers to enter the photos in order to fulfill the client's request. However, things always get out of their control...

(Source: Bilibili Official YouTube Channel)

name: Hua Jianghu Zhi Huan Shi Men Sheng 2nd Season
Sonny Boy
description:
The science-fiction ensemble drama centers around 36 boys and girls. On August 16, midway through a seemingly endless summer vacation, middle school third-year student Nagara, the mysterious transfer student Nozomi, and classmates such as Mizuho and Asakaze, are suddenly transported from their tranquil daily lives to a school adrift in an alternate dimension. They must survive with the super powers that have awakened within them. 

(Source: ANN)

name: Shaonian Baima Zui Chunfeng
description: The story takes place twenty years before Shao Nian Ge Xing.

name: Seitokai Yakuindomo Movie 2
description:
The cast is back and ready to quip! In this companion film that follows season 2 of the zany, irreverent Seitokai Yakuindomo anime series, the student council must again grapple with a mix of double-entendres and doubly potent teen hormones.

(Source: HIDIVE)

name: Notation of Rotating Earth
description: Graduation film by Takashi Ohashi, featuring a 360° time lapse of Daiba,Tokyo set to classical music, animating the background lights of the city.

name: Shichigahama de Mitsuketa
description:
Shichigahama de Mitsuketa is a 20-minute animated short based on the March 11, 2011 earthquake and resulting tsunami that struck Japan one decade ago. The anime conveys lessons learned from the earthquake and the 10-year history of Shichigahama's reconstruction.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Healer Girl
description:
The anime depicts the world of "Healer Girls" — high school girls who cure people with singing.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Oshiri Mae Man: Akagi Nyugyo Chocomint CM
aliases: Oshiri Mae Man: Akagi Nyugyo Chocomint CM
description: A web CM features Oshiri Mae Man promoting Akagi Nyugyo Chocomint ice cream.

name: Oshiri Mae Man
description:
The defender of justice Oshiri Mae Man flies through the air, doing his best to protect the peace in his town. So when a gang of thugs starts to harass a woman on the streets, he boldly approaches. Then, Oshiri Mae Man goes up against a nefarious criminal imposter that's giving the hero a bad reputation.

These videos by Takashi Taniguchi featuring Oshiri Mae Man from his original mobile game.

(Source: Anime-Planet)

name: Wakame Buildings
description: Abstract short film by Kojirou Shishido featuring seaweed and sea urchins.

name: Beotkkotnamu Kokkiri Sup
description: In the middle of the forest stands an elephant with a cherry blossom tree growing from its back and a girl comes to tend it.

name: Bug
description: Promotional web videos directed by Densuke28 to showcase the 2019 Spring and Summer line for Japanese clothing brand KAIKO.

name: Hide And Seek
description:
The film covered a residential area with superb view of both ocean and mountain. From that day this town became dark as pitch. Hidden in this darkness were lights in the town, my way home, my mother, and my expected baby in my belly. This animation depicts the truth hiding behind the facts.

Graduate Work 2012 from Keiko Shiraishi, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Movie: Maji Love ST☆RISH Tours
aliases: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Movie: Maji Love ST☆RISH Tours
Uta no Prince-sama Maji Love Starish Tours Movie
Gekijouban Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love Starish Tours
description:
The film — described as part of a "new theatrical film series" — will be entirely composed of concert footage of the ST☆RISH idol group.

(Source: Anime News Network)

name: Kaginado
description:
A crossover television anime featuring chibi renditions of characters from Kanon, Air, Clannad, Little Busters!, Rewrite, and additional Key franchises to be revealed at a later date.

(Source: MAL News)

name: Dance Dance Danseur
description:
Danseur noble--a ballet dancer qualified to dance the role of the prince. Second-year junior high school student Murao Junpei was fascinated by ballet as a boy, but gave up on dancing after his father's death, as he had to become a man. However, one day, a beautiful transfer student named Godai Miyako appears before him. Miyako takes notice in Junpei's love of ballet and invites him to dance with her. Along with Miyako's cousin Mori Ruou, he begins his career as a full-fledged ballet dancer, with the aim of becoming the world's best dancer--the Danseur noble! Only those who have sacrificed everything are permitted to stand in the beautiful and harsh world of classical ballet. What will be the fate of a total beginner like Junpei?!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Pacific Rim: The Black Season 2
description: Season 2 of Pacific Rim: The Black

name: Xing You Ji: Fengbao Famila 2
description:
In the future where the entire universe can be traveled freely, the competitive reality show "Storm Familla" held on Jupiter is all the rage in the solar system. This year's championship will begin with a match between McDonald and Aurora.

(Source: Anilist)

name: Blood of Zeus Season 2
description: The second season of Blood of Zeus

name: Mi Bao Zhi Guo
description:
In the multiverse called the "data realm", everything corresponding to the real world is stored. Within it, the data from relics of human culture gained self-awareness, and a secret group of spirits established an alliance: The Country of Rare Treasure.
The restorers, while investigating their own origins, lead the secret spirits against the forgotten viruses that will devour everything.

(Source: bilibili, translated)

name: DOTA: Dragon's Blood Book II
description: Season 2 of DOTA: Dragon's Blood.

name: Love, Death + Robots Volume 3
description: Third collection of shorts.

name: Kyoka
description: A short animation by Naoki Yoshibe.

name: Around the World!
description: Naoki Yoshibe's graduation work from 2007 at Tokyo Polytechnic University

name: Mayumi
description:
Mayumi is a spoiled girl whose parents buy her everything she wants. She names her name "Mayumi" to everything she receives, and her room is gradually filled with many Mayumis. Mayumi herself gets swallowed by the characters of her name.

1st year work 2016 by Chinami Taniguchi, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Attack on Titan: The Final Season PV
aliases: Attack on Titan: The Final Season PV
Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season PV
description: Preview of the final season with original animation that was either not used in the main series or was redone for the main series.

name: Buggy Map
description:
Short animations by Densuke28 simulating video game bugs. The original short was a personal project and was released on his Vimeo page. The following year, a new version of the work was showcased at a museum exhibition on seven different screens, accompanied with a 3D printed model of the character in the short. A forty-nine second clip titled "BUGGY MAP -Exhibition Ver.-" was uploaded to Densuke28's official Vimeo which combines the animations on the multiple screens into one video.

(Source: MAL)

name: Candy Caries
description:
A short animation made to promote WIT studio's new stop motion animation studio, with Tomoki Misato.

(Source: Anime-Planet)

name: Wanmei Shijie
description:
Born into a unique world where villages fight to gain power and control, the main character, Shi Hao, is a genius blessed by the heavens born under the poorest of conditions.

His clan, however, has a mysterious past. To rise up and become the genius he is meant to be, the clan goes through every effort to aid his cultivation as they battle through fanatical monsters and engage in power struggles with other clans.

His journey will bring him through unknown lands until he is able to become a person that can truly shake the world.

(Source: Novels Xianxia&Xuanhuan Wiki)

name: 86 Part 2
description: The second cour of 86: Eighty-Six.

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Tsuioku-hen
aliases: The Irregular at Magic High School: Reminiscence Arc
description:
Looking at Miyuki and Tatsuya now, it might be hard to imagine them as anything other than loving siblings. But it wasn't always this way..

Three years ago, Miyuki was always uncomfortable around her older brother. The rest of their family treated him no better than a lowly servant, even though he was the perfect Guardian, watching over Miyuki while she lived a normal middle school life. But what really bothered her was that he never showed any emotions or thoughts of his own.

However, when danger comes calling during a fateful trip to Okinawa, their relationship as brother and sister will change forever…

(Source: Yen Press)

name: World Trigger 3
description: The third season of World Trigger.
